details.arabic_diacless: ربنا اصرف عنا عذاب جهـنم ‌ۖان عذابها كان غراما
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا اصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَـنَّمَ ‌ۖاِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
details.translations: Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;

pageTitle: Seeking refuge froom the punishment from hellfire [25:65]
